com.rublon.sdk.core

Class RublonConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rublon.sdk.core.RublonConsumer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rublon2Factor, RublonLogin

    public abstract class RublonConsumer
extends java.lang.Object
    Rublon Consumer abstract class.

    The main class provides common methods for all Rublon services. In order for the class to work properly, it must be initiated with two parameters: System Token and the Secret Key. Both of parameters can be obtained from developer dashboard at developers.rublon.com.

    Author:
    Rublon Developers
